Summary Note:
Conti Leonardi Marino and the RM are childhood friends, having attended the same schools and shared many life experiences. Their enduring friendship has laid a solid foundation for their business relationship.
Conti Leonardi Marino is a 26 year old Financial Advisor from Italy.
He was drawn to Julius Baer's holistic financial planning and investment strategies, prompting the decision to join.
Family Background: Conti Leonardi Marino is currently widowed. He does not have any children.
Education Background:
Conti earned his secondary school diploma from Scuola Media Statale Antonio Meucci Firenze in 2016.
In 2022, Conti graduated from European University of Rome with a degree.
Occupation History:
Conti Leonardi Marino is a 26 year old and comes from Italy.
At Intesa Sanpaolo Private Banking, Conti Leonardi Marino held the position of Financial Advisor from 2022 till now, developing essential skills in the field.
Wealth Summary:
During his work, he focused on financial growth, making diverse investments and ultimately saving 10000 EUR.
Client does not have any properties.
In addition to his career success, he also received an inheritance of 1920000 EUR from his late grandfather, a renowned Hedge Fund Manager, in 2015.
Client Summary: The RM is very happy to have Conti as a customer and is looking forward to a long and successful cooperation.
